      • addMe

        public void addMe()
        Send addMe message to users in the chatroom. Users in the chatroom upon receiving this message will add local user into one of their specific chatrooms

      • removeMe

        public void removeMe()
        Send removeMe message to users in the chatroom. Users in the chatroom upon receiving this message will remove local user from one of their specific chatrooms
